35  average  this ones rough around the edges the game looks like it was made 10 years before its release date the best part is the atmosphere but it doesnt offset the problems like clunky controls and some not so good item interaction its nice to see how much progress they made between this and stasis bone totem which was awesome id skip this one and stick to the newer game or get it very very cheap if youre curious

yes

a fairly tense atmospheric adventurehorror game  the writing is solid the voice acting is mostly good  the puzzles are occasionally a bit counterintuitive but i managed to make it through only consulting a walkthrough once and in retrospect i probably would have figured it out on my own  also i hope you like reading because if you want to make any sense of what the heck is going on in the game youre going to have to do a lot of it  i dont see this as a problem

this is probably the most horrific horror game ive gotten my hands on and its a point and click adventure that said it does at times run into the point and click issue where you can think of multiple completely valid ways to use your items but the game is only programmed to do one solution which might not make any sense id recommend tabbing over to a walkthrough if you get stuck on something for 10m
janky oldschool point  click horror adventure with great sound design music and overall atmosphere recommended  my only nitpick is that the sound mixing is sometimes not great

its not perfect theres a few odd looking animations and the environment can be a bit confusing sometimes but overall pretty fun i loved the surgery section never before it takes a lot to make me squeamish but that surgery scene got me i wish we got chased or had to avoid the monster at some point the amount of times you see the monster could be counted on 1 hand and it never poses an active threat to you overall if you wanted a point and click dead space here you go

i very much liked the focus on storytelling the puzzles are fair the inventory never becomes overwhelming overall a good scifi story and a very good point and click the only negative is unskippable dialogue which can get annoying if you didnt get things right the first time but it is still an easy recommend
